channel.title: Rce on Fieryrival's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rce on Fieryrival's Blog

item.title: Forging the One Shell: A PDFKit RCE on HTB 'Precious'
item.description: Easy rated box from hackthebox comprising of a Ruby pdfkit RCE for foothold and a sudo misconfiguration for privilege escalation.

item.title: From Forged Requests to Pager Escapes on HTB 'Sau'
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox comprising of an SSRF leading to RCE for foothold, and a systemctl less pager escape for privilege escalation.

item.title: Beyond the Interface: Escalating with a Bash Operator Flaw
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox with hidden directories leading to RCE for foothold, and bash operator evaluation for privilege escalation.

item.title: From Spring Boot LFI to Ansible Root: A Guide to HTB 'Inject'
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox with Springboot application for foothold and ansible for privilege escalation.
